title: Iloveegusi
author: Iloveegusi
content: I came across this postLida93   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5431730.msg61500260#msg61500260Were dem talk about out government wey go support crypto for naija.My opinion na say CBN nor go gree the decision mainly dey on their hand

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Then why not post this on the thread instead of creating another topic which is highly not necessary?Know that as CBN controls bank. The CBN governor controls the CBN. The president controls the CBN governor which is the head of the CBN.
